text: Hi all, Can someone help me to create an dnd module accordion where each accordion content can contain dnd element as a children?

Hi <@UJGFU6K0W>. This is not really possible. Custom modules can't contain dnd elements.

Another idea could be to utilize dnd sections& dnd rows but I wouldn't recommend to do this since sections and rows are not ment for such a usecase.

Could you provide more information about what you're trying to achieve?
I am trying to achieve this kind of layout when accordion open and shows other content, which can be card or any other module.
